    public class ScannerActivity
extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
implements android.view.TextureView.SurfaceTextureListener, android.view.View.OnClickListener
    This activity is the window where the user will scan the documents.
    Author:
    Nalin Angrish.

        A function to handle the click of a picture.

      • createSettingsPopup

        protected void createSettingsPopup()
        A function to create the popup for changing the settings. (Note that only flash is supported as yet.)

      • getRotation

        protected int getRotation()
        A function to get the camera's rotation based on the manufacturer as different manufacturers assemble cameras with different orientation
        Returns:
        the degrees to rotate the image

      • onBackPressed

        public void onBackPressed()
        A function to handle back key presses. It shows an alert dialog to the user to warn him that the pictures clicked till now will be deleted.
        Overrides:
        onBackPressed in class androidx.activity.ComponentActivity

      • onResume

        protected void onResume()
        A function mainly intended to refresh the screen count and hide the next-button when the user returns from the EditViewActivity ( hide if all pictures have been deleted by the user )

        onResume in class androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity

      • submit

        protected void submit()
        A function to handle the click of the submit button. This starts the EditViewActivity which can be used to make changes to the pictures.
